description:
Lo utilicé para ajustar la resolución del monitor wide screen (21:9) que le agregué a mi notebook. Me simplificó la tarea de generar los comandos para ir probando diferentes configuraciones. Simple pero efectivo.
Very simply but useful. I used it to adjust the screen resolution of a wide screen monitor (21:9) that i'm using instead of my laptop integrated display. The 21:9 screen resolution does not appear in the default list of availables resolutions, so you have to create it manually, that's when this program is so useful.
Used this on ZorinOs lite, which somehow did not recognise my 34" ultrawide 2560x1080 resolution. This util fixed it!
summary: Fixed my ZorinOs Lite for ultrawide 2560x1080
It doesnt evem launch in GUI

description: I was need to change resolution in my second display (not built in). So I didn`t find such option. Not usefull for multiple monitors.
summary: No option to choose a display

description: sem duvidas o melhor app para configurar um monitor com erro de escala
summary: otimo app, resolveu o meu problema de escala

description: As an inexperienced Linux user, this app solved my display resolution problem easily. Totally recommended!
It worked very well with xrandr
